nodes.text: Elite stormtroopers were employed by the Galactic Empire. Darth Vader was accompanied by six such stormtroopers during the Sith Lord's vengeance campaign two months after the Battle of Yavin. These elite troopers often acted as bodyguards and personal soldiers for high-ranking leaders.

The Elite stormtrooper first appeared in the thirteenth issue of Dark Horse Comics' Star Wars comic book series, written by Brian Wood and pencilled by Facundo Percio. Released on January 8, 2014, it is the first of a two-part arc, Five Days of Sith.
